name: theblackswitch
description: A useful datapack library that I use for almost all my projects

verify_version.function: execute unless function theblackswitch:version_control/is_latest run return fail

debug_lines.prefix: execute if score #tbs-$version$.debug_enabled tbs.server_data matches 1 run tellraw @a[tag=tbs.debug] ["",{"text":"[Debug]: ","color":"yellow","bold":true},
